resources.string:
This is Avraham Meshumar's Android project for 5 points.


 It is an app called 'DietMaker' which creates simple personal diets based on physical data.

Just press the 'Enter Diet' button and enter your physical details. then will your personal diet appear.


 On later uses, you could enter how many calories you ate and how much time did you work out each day.
You are %1$s. You need to eat %2$d calories a day and workout %3$,.1f hours a day.
How many calories had you ate today?
How many hours did you workout today?
